title: Enhancing Clinical Practice Competencies: Metaphor-Based Science Learning Design: Hypermedia Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain three or more automatically applied metaphors in hypermedia interfaces.
Learners can improve hypermedia learning material navigation strategies by at least two methods through metaphor-based analysis
Learners can create science learning content applying metaphor design principles in project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
